body: I think it doesn't matter, since `NodeDefBuilder::ControlInput()` and `NodeDefBuilder::Input()` operate on different class members, and before `Finalize()` is called nothing will be mixed together. The change is ok, but the comment is misleading, please remove.
body_html: I think it doesn't matter, since NodeDefBuilder::ControlInput() and NodeDefBuilder::Input() operate on different class members, and before Finalize() is called nothing will be mixed together. The change is ok, but the comment is misleading, please remove.
